scripts.install: npm run build && plugin install 'dist/Notes Bin.beatPlugin'
scripts.refresh-dev: node scripts/build.js 'dist/Notes Bin.beatPlugin' dev && plugin install 'dist/Notes Bin.beatPlugin'
scripts.dev: npm run refresh-dev && chokidar 'src/**' 'public/**' -c 'npm run refresh-dev'
scripts.dev-ui: npm run refresh-dev-ui && chokidar 'src/**' 'public/**' -c 'npm run refresh-dev-ui' & serve dist/ui --no-clipboard
